divs: sighting detailsvery dark black, upright 8x14ft rectangular with flared bottem, hard defined edges yet inside blacked out beyond normal for lighting. flew with purpose at around 200mph. stayed on well defined, smooth path. no sound. approx. 20:20 on 9\23\11, bozeman, mt
